speaker: LUCENTIO
text_entry: ACT I

speaker: LUCENTIO
text_entry: SCENE I. On a ship at sea: a tempestuous noise

speaker: LUCENTIO
text_entry: of thunder and lightning heard.

speaker: LUCENTIO
text_entry: Enter a Master and a Boatswain

speaker: Master
text_entry: Boatswain!

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Here, master: what cheer?

speaker: Master
text_entry: Good, speak to the mariners: fall to't, yarely,

speaker: Master
text_entry: or we run ourselves aground: bestir, bestir.

speaker: Master
text_entry: Exit

speaker: Master
text_entry: Enter Mariners

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Heigh, my hearts! cheerly, cheerly, my hearts!

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: yare, yare! Take in the topsail. Tend to the

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: master's whistle. Blow, till thou burst thy wind,

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: if room enough!

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Enter ALONSO, SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, FERDINAND, GONZALO, and others

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Good boatswain, have care. Where's the master?

speaker: ALONSO
text_entry: Play the men.

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: I pray now, keep below.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Where is the master, boatswain?

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Do you not hear him? You mar our labour: keep your

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: cabins: you do assist the storm.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Nay, good, be patient.

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: When the sea is. Hence! What cares these roarers

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: for the name of king? To cabin: silence! trouble us not.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Good, yet remember whom thou hast aboard.

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: None that I more love than myself. You are a

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: counsellor; if you can command these elements to

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: silence, and work the peace of the present, we will

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: not hand a rope more; use your authority: if you

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: cannot, give thanks you have lived so long, and make

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: yourself ready in your cabin for the mischance of

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: the hour, if it so hap. Cheerly, good hearts! Out

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: of our way, I say.

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Exit

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: I have great comfort from this fellow: methinks he

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: hath no drowning mark upon him; his complexion is

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: perfect gallows. Stand fast, good Fate, to his

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: hanging: make the rope of his destiny our cable,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: for our own doth little advantage. If he be not

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: born to be hanged, our case is miserable.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Exeunt

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Re-enter Boatswain

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Down with the topmast! yare! lower, lower! Bring

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: her to try with main-course.

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: A cry within

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: A plague upon this howling! they are louder than

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: the weather or our office.

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Re-enter SEBASTIAN, ANTONIO, and GONZALO

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Yet again! what do you here? Shall we give o'er

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: and drown? Have you a mind to sink?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: A pox o' your throat, you bawling, blasphemous,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: incharitable dog!

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Work you then.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Hang, cur! hang, you whoreson, insolent noisemaker!

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: We are less afraid to be drowned than thou art.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: I'll warrant him for drowning; though the ship were

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: no stronger than a nutshell and as leaky as an

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: unstanched wench.

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Lay her a-hold, a-hold! set her two courses off to

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: sea again; lay her off.

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: Enter Mariners wet

speaker: Mariners
text_entry: All lost! to prayers, to prayers! all lost!

speaker: Boatswain
text_entry: What, must our mouths be cold?

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: The king and prince at prayers! let's assist them,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: For our case is as theirs.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: I'm out of patience.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: We are merely cheated of our lives by drunkards:

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: This wide-chapp'd rascal--would thou mightst lie drowning

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: The washing of ten tides!

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: He'll be hang'd yet,

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Though every drop of water swear against it

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: And gape at widest to glut him.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: A confused noise within:   'Mercy on us!'--  'We split, we split!'--'Farewell, my wife and  children!'-- 'Farewell, brother!'--'We split, we split, we split!'

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Let's all sink with the king.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Let's take leave of him.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Exeunt ANTONIO and SEBASTIAN

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Now would I give a thousand furlongs of sea for an

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: acre of barren ground, long heath, brown furze, any

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: thing. The wills above be done! but I would fain

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: die a dry death.

speaker: GONZALO
text_entry: Exeunt
